turns.utterance: I'm taking a vacation to Paris soon. Can you see if there are any one-way flights available?
turns.response: At what time and from what location will you be leaving?

turns.utterance: I got my destination wrong. I'm actually visiting Washington. I'll be leaving from Chicago on Tuesday next week. What airline is used doesn't matter.
turns.response: How about American Airlines for your flight? It leaves at 8:10 am, has 0 stops, and a ticket for it costs $128.
Another one you could go on is Southwest Airlines. That flight leaves at 7:25 am, has 0 stops, and a ticket for it costs $119.

turns.utterance: What airport will the flight depart from? Can I get a refund on the ticket?
turns.response: The flight will depart from O'Hare International Airport. Sadly, you cannot get a refund for your ticket.
Would you like to purchase a ticket right now?

turns.utterance: No, I don't want to purchase a ticket just yet. Let's see what other flights there are. Can you find me a round trip flight?
turns.response: At what time will you return?

turns.utterance: I aim to return on the 7th of this month.
turns.response: I found 1 flight that could suit your needs, from Southwest Airlines. It leaves at 7:25 am and returns at 3:50 pm. A ticket for it costs $166.

turns.utterance: When will the onward flight arrive? Can I get a refund on the ticket?
turns.response: The onward flight arrives at 10:23 am, but alas, you can't get a refund on your ticket.

turns.utterance: That flight is fine with me.
turns.response: Should I purchase tickets right now?
Are there any other matters in which I can help you?

turns.utterance: That's all for now. Glad you were able to lend a hand.
turns.response: It's my pleasure to be of help. Have a wonderful day.

phrase: im not ready to book just yet.
no, i don't want to purchase a ticket just yet.
